channel.title: Stefan Kracht Blog
channel.description: A mixed collection of articles about development, running and new releases of my current side projects.

item.title: Creating 3D models with ruby
item.description: A lightweight 3d ruby gem to generate obj files.

item.title: How much would you pay for a macbook sticker?
item.description: All income and expenses of my online sticker shop Stickerlicious and why I charge 8 € for a sticker.

item.title: November is for charity - all Stickerlicious income will be donated.
item.description: All november income of stickerlicious will be donated to children’s hospice Sternbrücke in hamburg.

item.title: Charity November Recap
item.description: The result of stickerlicious charity november and the response letter of children’s hospice Sternbrücke.

item.title: Why run when you could walk?
item.description: Why should you run? An article on why and how I got started with running and how it evolved over the past years.

item.title: Introducing runverter.io
item.description: Introducing Runverter.io, the only running calculator you will ever need. Featuring a pace calculator, race predictor, split time calculator and much more.

item.title: The race predictor has landed
item.description: Runverter.io now features a race predictor that uses a previous race result to estimate an upcomming one

item.title: Say hi to the split time calculator
item.description: Runverter.io now supports a splits calculator that displays the perfect split times you need to finish a race in your desired time.

item.title: Race day live tracking for runners
item.description: The first draft of an idea about race day live tracking for runners that became my side project raceday.me.

item.title: Hello darkmode my old friend
item.description: Runverter.io now comes with themes that allow you to switch the appearance between a light or dark color mode.
